Enabler Code (Must Be On) [GMO]

Body Type [Crapulecorp]
282053EC 00000909
0020690D 0000000X
E0000000 80008000

0 Normal
1 Weapons Enabled
2 Fat*

Always Have Gun [Crapulecorp]
282053EC 00000909
0020690D 00000001
0021172E 0000000X
E0000000 80008000
*Replace X to:
0 Shotgun
1 Rocket Launcher
2 Flamethrower
3 Heavy Machine Gun
4 Laser*
